sentences.english: Please select the BEA Branch from which you would like to collect all your Personalised Octopus cards.
sentences.chinese: 請選擇領取所有個人八達通卡之東亞銀行分行。

sentences.english: This section is to be completed by BEA principal or supplementary cardholder.
sentences.chinese: 此部份只供東亞銀行信用卡主卡或附屬卡持卡人填寫。

sentences.english: The U. S. head of Bank of East Asia was not immediately available to comment.
sentences.chinese: 東亞銀行美國總部沒有立即發表評論。

sentences.english: Chairman of the Bank of East Asia David Li agrees that the HOS should be revived.
sentences.chinese: 另外，東亞銀行主席李國寶也贊成復建居屋。

sentences.english: BEA (Bank of East Asia) and SCB (Standard Chartered Bank) are also planning to set branches in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 東亞銀行和渣打銀行也正準備入駐湖南。
